ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Charm
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL, wished it was me!  It actually was a friend in another guild, Dramor. I was busy on my first successful Vox raid instead :).  BTW, Warrunner on Prexus
ygData.messageBody:
LOL, wished it was me! It actually was a friend in another guild, Dramor.

I was busy on my first successful Vox raid instead :). BTW, Warrunner on
Prexus took a couple pot shots at Vox with the new charm, but none of them
stuck. The IGs for Vox was hilarious to say the least. We had 4 bards on
the raid all with their new toy. Someone pulled 6 IGs and 4 of them
immediately became bard pets :).


----- Original Message -----
From: Sylly Songsynger <jgs@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2000 8:47 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Charm


> So where is the screen shot of:
>
> Innoruuk says, "Taneran is my leader!"
> Innoruuk says, "Guarding you with my life..."
>
> <eg>
>
> Sylly
>
